name: Zero G's
description:
Controls

Mouse - Camera Movement

LMB - Shoot

WSAD - Move when on a platform

Space - Jump when on a platform

Details

Survive as long as you can in Zero Gravity! Shoot to propel yourself through the environment!

Blue spheres restore oxygen and yellow bullets reload ammo.

This is an exploration of movement in zero gravity from a first person perspective. 

The player needs to plan the use of their limited ammo to navigate around the level while their oxygen levels deplete over time.
